Interface Game

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public interface Game
extends java.io.Serializable

This interface specifies the behaviour expected from the CODE system as required for 2COM0087 Cwk3 - Feb 2011

Version:
16/02/11
Author:
A.A.Marczyk

dismissChampion

boolean dismissChampion(java.lang.String name)

Parameters:
name - is the name of the champion
Returns:
true if dismissed, else false

hasLost

boolean hasLost()
returns true if treasury <=0 and the army has no champions who can be dismissed (all champions being dead or resting).

hireChampion

java.lang.String hireChampion(java.lang.String name)
Allows a champion to be added to the army, if there is enough money in the treasury for the hire fee.The champion's state is set to "available"

Parameters:
name - is the name of the champion
Returns:
"Not found" if champion not found, "Not available" if champion not available or already hired, "Hired" if champion hired, "Not enough money" if not enough money in the treasury

isChallenge

boolean isChallenge(int num)
returns true if the number represents a challenge

Parameters:
num - is the reference number of the challenge

isInArmy

boolean isInArmy(java.lang.String name)
Returns true if the champion with the name is in the player's army, false otherwise.

Parameters:
name - is the name of the champion
Returns:
true if the champion with the name is in the player's army, false otherwise.

meetChallenge

java.lang.String meetChallenge(int challNo)
Meets the challenge represented by the challenge number.Finds a champion from the army who can meet the challenge. The results of meeting a challenge will be one of the following: “Challenge won by...“ – add reward to treasury, set the champion to resting and return the name of champion, “Challenge lost as no champion available” – deduct reward from treasury,“Challenge lost on skill level” - deduct reward from treasury, the champion is killed. Add " is dead" to the message. If the challenge is lost and there is no money left, add "You have NO money in the treasury"

Parameters:
challNo - is the reference number of the challenge
Returns:
a String showing the result of meeting the challenge

restoreChampion

boolean restoreChampion(java.lang.String name)
Restores a champion to the army by setting their state to AVAILABLE at a cost of 50 gulden.

Parameters:
the - name of the champion to be restored
Returns:
true if restored, else false

restoreGame

Player restoreGame(java.lang.String filename)

saveGame

void saveGame(java.lang.String filename)

toString

java.lang.String toString()
Returns a String representation of the state of the game, including the name of the player, state of the treasury, the champions in the army (or, "No champions" if army is empty)

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
a String representation of the state of the game, including the name of the player, state of the treasury, whether bust or not, and the champions currently in the army,(or, "No champions" if army is empty)
